title: The Joy Luck Club
creator_credit: Lydia Tanji, Ronald Bass, Patrick Markey, Amy Tan, Wayne Wang and Donald Graham Burt
headline_credit: China, United States and United States of America, 1993
brief_description: Based on Amy Tan’s best-selling novel, The Joy Luck Club tells the story of two generations of Chinese women and spans from feudal China to modern America while highlighting the similarities and differences between the two generations.

constellations_other.name: The Family Law
constellations_other.description: An exploration of Asian representation on screens around the world that delves into TV, cinema, documentaries and Disney princesses.

creator_credit_for_label: Lydia Tanji, Ronald Bass, Patrick Markey, Amy Tan, Wayne Wang and Donald Graham Burt
headline_credit_for_label: China, United States and United States of America, 1993
description: Through a series of flashbacks, four Chinese women born in America and their respective mothers born in feudal China explore their pasts.
description_for_label: Through a series of flashbacks, four Chinese women born in America and their respective mothers born in feudal China explore their pasts.
